title: BREAKING : Police curfew imposed for the entire country
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka has imposed a Police curfew imposed for the entire country with immediate effect.
Curfew was imposed following ugly scenes between pro-government groups and peaceful protestors in Colombo.
Human Rights Commission condemns violence on peaceful protests, and police inaction
BREAKING: Police Curfew imposed for Colombo South, North, and Central
